edu.purdue.bbc.util.equation
Interface Equation

All Known Implementing Classes:
EquationTerm, ExponentialEquation, LogEquation, MultiPartEquation, Polynomial
public interface Equation

An interface for a solvable single-variable equation.

Method Summary
 Equation derivative()
          Finds the derivative of the equation and returns it.
 Equation integral(double constant)
          Finds the integral of the equation and returns it.
 double solve(double x)
          Solves the equation for the given value of x.
 String toString(String exponentFormat)
          Returns a String representation of this Equation with the given exponentFormat.
 

Method Detail

solve

double solve(double x)
Solves the equation for the given value of x.

Parameters:
x - The value to solve the equation for.
Returns:
The solution to the equation with the given value.

derivative

Equation derivative()
Finds the derivative of the equation and returns it. This method may throw an UnsupportedOperationException if the operation is not supported by the implementing class.

Returns:
A new Equation which is the derivative of this equation.

integral

Equation integral(double constant)
Finds the integral of the equation and returns it. This method may throw an UnsupportedOperationException if the operation is not supported by the implementing class.

Parameters:
constant - A constant to be added to the integral of this equation.
Returns:
A new Equation which is the integral of this equation.

toString

String toString(String exponentFormat)
Returns a String representation of this Equation with the given exponentFormat.

Parameters:
exponentFormat - The format string to use for the exponent.
Returns:
A String representation of this Equation.
